instruction: Create a simulation scenario centered around the theme of online collaboration.
output: In this simulation, the players are challenged to form an effective online collaboration team with members from different areas of expertise. The team must work together to create a successful project, providing feedback and refining their plans as they go. Communication and planning are key to success, as the team deals with unpredictable climate and potential conflicts along the way. At the end of the simulation, the team must present their project to a group of judges who will decide if they have achieved their goals.
